acceptance-test-run.title: Podam Messaging System should return a Generic Type value
acceptance-test-run.name: podamMessagingSystemShouldReturnAGenericTypeValue

test-step.description: Given a Random Data Provider Strategy
Then the Object should not be null
Given a Message Channel to manufacture types
Then the Object should not be null
Given an Attribute Meta Data for Generic Types
Then the Object should not be null
Given a Message with header attributeMetadata=AttributeMetadata [attributeName=null and qualifier attributeType=class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ClassGenericConstructorPojo
Then the Object should not be null
When I send a Message to the channel <span class='step-parameter'>podamInputChannel
Then the Object should not be null
Then the Object should not be null
Then the two objects class java.lang.String and class java.lang.String should be equal
